alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ocean and central Burlington Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leisuretowne, or 22 miles east of Camden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Medford, Tabernacle, Presidential Lakes Estates, Pemberton, Wrightstown, Presidential Lakes, Browns Mills, Leisuretowne, Chatsworth, Old Halfway, Medford Lakes, Country Lake Estates, Pemberton Heights and Fort Dix. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
